formula: a(n) = floor[ e^(1/6)*6^n*n! ].a(n) = n!*sum(6^(n-k)/k!, k=0..n). E.g.f.: exp(x) / (1-6x). - _Philippe Del√©ham_, Mar 14 2004
crossrefs: Cf. A000522, A010844, A010845, A056545, A056546 for analogs. A056547/(A000142*A000400) is an increasingly good approximation to 6th root of e.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 20 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Jul 04 2000
